law.catch_line: Requests for information from local government.
law.text: The Legislative Research Commission may submit to any unit of local or state government any request for information concerning local fiscal management and fiscal conditions. Each unit shall be required to comply with such requests. Where information sought by the Legislative Research Commission is required by law to be filed with the county clerk or state agency, the Legislative Research Commission shall direct all requests to the appropriate county clerk or state agency.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 215, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1982.
